rows.label: bf07290100_0010
rows.name: Rex.

rows.label: bf07290100_0020
rows.name:
We've been walking too long.
Let's take a break.

rows.label: bf07290100_0030
rows.name: Huh? But...

rows.label: bf07290100_0040
rows.name: Don't rush. We still have a long way ahead.

rows.label: bf07290100_0050
rows.name:
Sit down too, Nia.
How about resting your head on my lap?

rows.label: bf07290100_0060
rows.name: Keep the jokes to your face, will you...

rows.label: bf07290100_0070
rows.name:
Sorry.
I didn't realize.

rows.label: bf07290100_0080
rows.name:
I understand your eagerness.
Don't worry about it.

rows.label: bf07290100_0090
rows.name:
Hana!
Let's cool down the drive furnace while we can, meh.

rows.label: bf07290100_0100
rows.name: Aye-aye, Masterpon!

rows.label: bf07290100_0110
rows.name: Waaah! Hot-hot-hot-hot, meh!

rows.label: bf07290100_0120
rows.name: Masterpon! Hana is sorry!

rows.label: bf07290100_0130
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]ï¼Ÿ

rows.label: bf07290100_0140
rows.name:
Emergency air.
It might help.

rows.label: bf07290100_0150
rows.name: Thanks...

rows.label: bf07290100_0160
rows.name: Ah, no, no! Not like that!

rows.label: bf07290100_0170
rows.name:
You need to pinch your nose 
and expand your lungs.

rows.label: bf07290100_0180
rows.name: Straighten your back and push out your chest...

rows.label: bf07290100_0190
rows.name: Is this... another salvager basic technique?

rows.label: bf07290100_0200
rows.name: Just try it, will you?

rows.label: bf07290100_0205
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]ADLIB

rows.label: bf07290100_0210
rows.name: Huh... that actually works pretty well.

rows.label: bf07290100_0220
rows.name: Right?

rows.label: bf07290100_0230
rows.name:
Back in the day, the senior salvagers 
helped me out with this method too.

rows.label: bf07290100_0240
rows.name:
Even though they acted like my parents,
they never really taught me anything worthwhile.

rows.label: bf07290100_0250
rows.name:
But there were a few useful things 
like this that they did teach me.

rows.label: bf07290100_0260
rows.name: Parents, huh.

rows.label: bf07290100_0270
rows.name:
My real parents didn't really 
teach me things like that either.

rows.label: bf07290100_0280
rows.name: My father was a fairly well-known lord in Gula.

rows.label: bf07290100_0290
rows.name:
I was forced to study a lot, but it was all about 
proper etiquette for becoming a lady.

rows.label: bf07290100_0300
rows.name: None of it is useful to me now.

rows.label: bf07290100_0310
rows.name:
So you were a proper young lady once, Nia.
Hard to imagine, though.

rows.label: bf07290100_0320
rows.name: I'll punch you...

rows.label: bf07290100_0330
rows.name: I hated studying.

rows.label: bf07290100_0340
rows.name:
But, looking back...
Those were the happiest times of my life.

rows.label: bf07290100_0350
rows.name: With my father, and then...

rows.label: bf07290100_0360
rows.name: my older sister, the three of us...

rows.label: bf07290100_0370
rows.name: You had an older sister?

rows.label: bf07290100_0380
rows.name:
Yeah. She was weak and sickly.
I often nursed her at her bedside.

rows.label: bf07290100_0390
rows.name:
My father tried to cure my sister's condition,
and started gathering people at some point.

rows.label: bf07290100_0400
rows.name: He became obsessed with it...

rows.label: bf07290100_0410
rows.name: My memories from that point on...

rows.label: bf07290100_0420
rows.name: ...started to change into not-so-happy ones...

rows.label: bf07290100_0430
rows.name: Nia...

rows.label: bf07290100_0440
rows.name:
My father spent too much money,
and eventually lost his position as lord...

rows.label: bf07290100_0450
rows.name: From then on, we became drifters.

rows.label: bf07290100_0460
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf07290100_0470
rows.name:
My sister, you know...
she couldn't endure that kind of life...

rows.label: bf07290100_0480
rows.name: She died, not long after.

rows.label: bf07290100_0490
rows.name: Sorry for going on about such a boring story.

rows.label: bf07290100_0500
rows.name: But this really works well.

rows.label: bf07290100_0510
rows.name:
Hey, if you had something like this,
you should have given it to me from the start!

rows.label: bf07290100_0515
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]ADLIB

rows.label: bf07290100_0520
rows.name:
I'm fine now.
Shall we go, Rex?
